sys_properties.name: x_1125801_servicen.Bio/About Me
sys_properties.value: Emerging ServiceNow developer specializing in IT Service Management (ITSM) , Governance Risk & Compliance and workflow automation. Skilled in customizing and configuring ServiceNow to optimize business processes and improve efficiency.My skills include ServiceNow development, configuration, and customization, as well as proficiency in Incident, Problem, Change, and Asset Management. Additionally, I excel in integrating ServiceNow with third-party systems and in custom application and workflow development.
